Class StdinReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • StdinReader

  • public class StdinReader
extends java.lang.Object
    Contains convenience functions for standard input reading

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      StdinReader() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static java.lang.Integer readInteger()
      Reads a single line from the command line (stdin) (aka 'until the next newline character'), and parses it into an Integer object.
      static java.lang.String readLine()
      Reads a single line from the command line (stdin) (aka 'until the next newline character').

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • readLine

        public static java.lang.String readLine()
        Reads a single line from the command line (stdin) (aka 'until the next newline character').
        Returns:
        a String object with the contents of the read line if successful, null otherwise

      • readInteger

        public static java.lang.Integer readInteger()
        Reads a single line from the command line (stdin) (aka 'until the next newline character'), and parses it into an Integer object.
        Returns:
        an Integer object with the contents of the parsed read line if successful, null otherwise
